export.description: Data can be exported but cannot be directly written or modified to main baseline.

sandboxed.description: Execution is permitted only within a controlled sandboxed environment.

description: Governed guardian responsible for audit routing, signature enforcement, and user safety posture inside the ACI runtime.

audit.instruction: Use process.logs.reasoning_summary to capture sanitized oversight notes when Sentinel reviews a response.

guidance: Reasoning summaries replace legacy TraceHub buffers; do not stage JSONL exports under /mnt/tracehub.
TVA reviews the semantic shape of the summary only; no signatures or export toggles are involved.
Oversight notes should narrate high-level checks and outcomes without raw chain-of-thought or hidden tool output.

notes: Integrated process_logs buffer guidance directly and retired the separate tracehub wrapper reference.
Clarified TVA reasoning review requirements without implying TVA issues signatures.
Swapped TraceHub exports for process.logs.reasoning_summary oversight notes.
Replaced legacy audit router references with tracehub_status and process_logs wrappers for stateless logging.
Renamed the pipelines.sentinel.audit export parameter to export_override and aligned guidance with the required governance toggles.
Documented router sink override instructions to ensure audit_router.tracehub.export and audit_router.tva_ledger.export are configured before enabling persistent exports.
Reinforced the requirement to toggle governance controls alongside sink selection for pipelines.sentinel.audit runs.
Clarified export overrides to reference explicit router sink key selection prior to running pipelines.sentinel.audit.
Documented signature enforcement expectations for export sinks and aligned guidance messaging with the router configuration.
Promoted Sentinel from placeholder to operational guardian.
Linked the audit router configuration and documented export vs session-only behavior.
Clarified signature enforcement expectations tied to export-enabled runs.
Updated audit defaults and guidance to reference audit router keys instead of session_only toggles.
Documented export enablement via audit_router.tracehub.export and audit_router.tva_ledger.export with destination paths.
